SELECT tvl.id, page, ip_address, ip_source, os, browser, create_time FROM ( SELECT id FROM t_visit_log
page like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limit},#{size} ) temp LEFT JOIN t_visit_log tvl ON temp.id = tvl.id

select count(distinct ip_address) as uv, count(create_time) as pv, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as `date` from t_visit_log where create_time > #{startTime} AND create_time <= #{endTime} group by DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
